Global Namespace Inheritance Tree Inheritance Graph Name Index
File: vsip/tensor.hpp
  1/* Copyright (c) 2005 by CodeSourcery, LLC.  All rights reserved. */
  2
  3/** @file    tensor.hpp
  4    @author  Stefan Seefeld
  5    @date    2005-04-26
  6    @brief   VSIPL++ Library: [view.tensor] views implementing
  7             three-dimensional tensors.
  8
  9    This file declares the \c const_Tensor and \c Tensor classes,
 10    which provide the generic View interface, and implement the
 11    mathematical idea of matrices, i.e. two-dimensional storage and
 12    access to values.  A \c const_Tensor view is not modifiable, but a
 13    \c Tensor view is modifiable.  */
 14
 15#ifndef VSIP_TENSOR_HPP
 16#define VSIP_TENSOR_HPP
 17
 18/***********************************************************************
 19  Included Files
 20***********************************************************************/
 21
 22#include <vsip/support.hpp>
 23#include <vsip/domain.hpp>
 24#include <vsip/dense.hpp>
 25#include <vsip/vector.hpp>
 26#include <vsip/matrix.hpp>
 27#include <vsip/core/block_traits.hpp>
 28#include <vsip/core/subblock.hpp>
 29#include <vsip/core/refcount.hpp>
 30#include <vsip/core/view_traits.hpp>
 31#include <vsip/core/assign.hpp>
 32#include <vsip/core/lvalue_proxy.hpp>
 33#ifndef VSIP_IMPL_REF_IMPL
 34# include <vsip_csl/pi/iterator.hpp>
 35#endif
 36
 37/***********************************************************************
 38  Declarations
 39***********************************************************************/
 40
 41namespace vsip
 42{
 43
 44enum whole_domain_type { whole_domain};
 45
 46/// View which appears as a three-dimensional, read-only tensor.
 47template <typename T, typename Block>
 48class const_Tensor : public impl::Non_assignable,
 49		     public  vsip::impl_const_View<vsip::const_Tensor,Block>
 50{
 51  typedef vsip::impl_const_View<vsip::const_Tensor,Block> impl_base_type;
 52  typedef typename impl::Lvalue_factory_type<Block>::type impl_factory_type;
 53
 54public:
 55  // Compile-time values.
 56  static const dimension_type dim = 3;
 57  typedef Block                                      block_type;
 58  typedef typename block_type::value_type            value_type;
 59  typedef typename impl_factory_type::reference_type reference_type;
 60  typedef typename impl_factory_type::const_reference_type
 61		const_reference_type;
 62
 63  typedef vsip::whole_domain_type whole_domain_type;
 64  static whole_domain_type const whole_domain = vsip::whole_domain;
 65
 66  typedef typename impl_base_type::impl_const_view_type impl_const_view_type;
 67
 68  // [view.tensor.subview_types]
 69protected:
 70  typedef typename Block::map_type  impl_map_type;
 71  typedef impl::Subset_block<Block>  impl_subblock_type;
 72
 73public:
 74  typedef const_Tensor<T, impl_subblock_type> subview_type;
 75  typedef const_Tensor<T, impl_subblock_type> const_subview_type;
 76
 77  template <dimension_type D0, dimension_type D1, dimension_type D2>
 78  struct transpose_view
 79  {
 80    typedef impl::Permuted_block<block_type, tuple<D0, D1, D2> >
 81      impl_transblock_type;
 82    typedef const_Tensor<T, impl_transblock_type> type;
 83    typedef const_Tensor<T, impl_transblock_type> const_type;
 84  }; 
 85
 86  // The following types are not (yet) part of the spec.
 87  template <dimension_type D>
 88  struct submatrix : public impl::Compile_time_assert<(D < 3)>
 89  {
 90    typedef impl::Sliced_block<block_type, D> block;
 91    typedef const_Matrix<T, block> impl_type;
 92    typedef const_Matrix<T, block> impl_const_type;
 93
 94    typedef impl::Subset_block<block> subblock;
 95    typedef const_Matrix<T, subblock> type;
 96    typedef const_Matrix<T, subblock> const_type;
 97  };
 98
 99  template <dimension_type D1, dimension_type D2>
100  struct subvector : public impl::Compile_time_assert<(D1 < D2 && D2 < 3)>
101  {
102    typedef impl::Sliced2_block<block_type, D1, D2> block;
103    typedef const_Vector<T, block> impl_type;
104    typedef const_Vector<T, block> impl_const_type;
105
106    typedef impl::Subset_block<block> subblock;
107    typedef const_Vector<T, subblock> type;
108    typedef const_Vector<T, subblock> const_type;
109  };
110
111public:
112
113  // [view.tensor.constructors]
114  const_Tensor(length_type i, length_type j, length_type k, T const& value,
115	       impl_map_type const& map = impl_map_type())
116    : impl_base_type(new block_type(Domain<3>(i, j, k), value, map), impl::noincrement)
117  {}
118  const_Tensor(length_type i, length_type j, length_type k,
119	       impl_map_type const& map = impl_map_type())
120    : impl_base_type(new block_type(Domain<3>(i, j, k), map), impl::noincrement)
121  {}
122  const_Tensor(Block& blk) VSIP_NOTHROW
123    : impl_base_type (&blk)
124  {}
125  const_Tensor(const_Tensor const& v) VSIP_NOTHROW
126    : impl_base_type(&v.block())
127  {}
128  ~const_Tensor() VSIP_NOTHROW
129  {}
130
131  // [view.tensor.transpose]
132  template <dimension_type D0, dimension_type D1, dimension_type D2>
133  typename transpose_view<D0, D1, D2>::const_type  
134  transpose() const VSIP_NOTHROW
135  {
136    typename transpose_view<D0, D1, D2>::impl_transblock_type  block(
137      this->block());
138    return typename transpose_view<D0, D1, D2>::const_type(block);
139  }
140
141  // [view.tensor.valaccess]
142  value_type get(index_type i, index_type j, index_type k) const VSIP_NOTHROW
143  {
144    assert(i < this->size(0));
145    assert(j < this->size(1));
146    assert(k < this->size(2));
147    return this->block().get(i, j, k);
148  }
149
150  // Supported for some, but not all, underlying Blocks.
151  const_reference_type operator()(index_type i, index_type j, index_type k)
152    const VSIP_NOTHROW
153  { impl_factory_type f(this->block()); return f.impl_ref(i, j, k); }
154
155  // [view.tensor.subviews]
156  const_subview_type get(Domain<3> const& dom)
157    const VSIP_THROW((std::bad_alloc))
158  {
159    impl_subblock_type block(dom, this->block());
160    return const_subview_type(block);
161  }
162
163  const_subview_type operator()(Domain<3> const& dom)
164    const VSIP_THROW((std::bad_alloc))
165  {
166    impl_subblock_type block(dom, this->block());
167    return const_subview_type(block);
168  }
169
170  typename subvector<1, 2>::const_type
171  operator()(Domain<1> const& d, index_type j, index_type k)
172    const VSIP_THROW((std::bad_alloc))
173  {
174    typename subvector<1, 2>::block block(this->block(), j, k);
175    typename subvector<1, 2>::subblock sblock(d, block);
176    return typename subvector<1, 2>::const_type(sblock);
177  }
178  typename subvector<0, 2>::const_type
179  operator()(index_type i, Domain<1> const& d, index_type k)
180    const VSIP_THROW((std::bad_alloc))
181  {
182    typename subvector<0, 2>::block block(this->block(), i, k);
183    typename subvector<0, 2>::subblock sblock(d, block);
184    return typename subvector<0, 2>::const_type(sblock);
185  }
186  typename subvector<0, 1>::const_type
187  operator()(index_type i, index_type j, Domain<1> const& d)
188    const VSIP_THROW((std::bad_alloc))
189  {
190    typename subvector<0, 1>::block block(this->block(), i, j);
191    typename subvector<0, 1>::subblock sblock(d, block);
192    return typename subvector<0, 1>::const_type(sblock);
193  }
194  typename submatrix<0>::const_type
195  operator()(index_type i, Domain<1> const& d1, Domain<1> const& d2)
196    const VSIP_THROW((std::bad_alloc))
197  {
198    typename submatrix<0>::block block(this->block(), i);
199    typename submatrix<0>::subblock sblock(Domain<2>(d1, d2), block);
200    return typename submatrix<0>::const_type(sblock);
201  }
202  typename submatrix<1>::const_type
203  operator()(Domain<1> const& d1, index_type j, Domain<1> const& d2)
204    const VSIP_THROW((std::bad_alloc))
205  {
206    typename submatrix<1>::block block(this->block(), j);
207    typename submatrix<1>::subblock sblock(Domain<2>(d1, d2), block);
208    return typename submatrix<1>::const_type(sblock);
209  }
210  typename submatrix<2>::const_type
211  operator()(Domain<1> const& d1, Domain<1> const& d2, index_type k)
212    const VSIP_THROW((std::bad_alloc))
213  {
214    typename submatrix<2>::block block(this->block(), k);
215    typename submatrix<2>::subblock sblock(Domain<2>(d1, d2), block);
216    return typename submatrix<2>::const_type(sblock);
217  }
218
219  /// The following operators are an addition to the spec.
220  /// See https://support.codesourcery.com/VSIPLXX/issue26
221  typename subvector<1, 2>::impl_const_type
222  operator()(whole_domain_type, index_type j, index_type k)
223    const VSIP_THROW((std::bad_alloc))
224  {
225    typename subvector<1, 2>::block block(this->block(), j, k);
226    return typename subvector<1, 2>::impl_const_type(block);
227  }
228  typename subvector<0, 2>::impl_const_type
229  operator()(index_type i, whole_domain_type, index_type k)
230    const VSIP_THROW((std::bad_alloc))
231  {
232    typename subvector<0, 2>::block block(this->block(), i, k);
233    return typename subvector<0, 2>::impl_const_type(block);
234  }
235  typename subvector<0, 1>::impl_const_type
236  operator()(index_type i, index_type j, whole_domain_type)
237    const VSIP_THROW((std::bad_alloc))
238  {
239    typename subvector<0, 1>::block block(this->block(), i, j);
240    return typename subvector<0, 1>::impl_const_type(block);
241  }
242  typename submatrix<0>::impl_const_type
243  operator()(index_type i, whole_domain_type, whole_domain_type)
244    const VSIP_THROW((std::bad_alloc))
245  {
246    typename submatrix<0>::block block(this->block(), i);
247    return typename submatrix<0>::const_type(block);
248  }
249  typename submatrix<1>::impl_const_type
250  operator()(whole_domain_type, index_type j, whole_domain_type)
251    const VSIP_THROW((std::bad_alloc))
252  {
253    typename submatrix<1>::block block(this->block(), j);
254    return typename submatrix<1>::const_type(block);
255  }
256  typename submatrix<2>::impl_const_type
257  operator()(whole_domain_type, whole_domain_type, index_type k)
258    const VSIP_THROW((std::bad_alloc))
259  {
260    typename submatrix<2>::block block(this->block(), k);
261    return typename submatrix<2>::impl_const_type(block);
262  }
263#ifndef VSIP_IMPL_REF_IMPL
264  template <typename I, typename J, typename K>
265  typename impl::enable_if_c<vsip_csl::pi::is_iterator<I>::value || 
266			     vsip_csl::pi::is_iterator<J>::value || 
267			     vsip_csl::pi::is_iterator<K>::value,
268			     vsip_csl::pi::Call<block_type, I, J, K> >::type
269  operator()(I const &i, J const &j, K const &k)
270  {
271    using namespace vsip_csl::pi;
272    return Call<block_type, I, J, K>(this->block(), i, j, k);
273  }
274#endif
275
276};
277
278
279/// View which appears as a three-dimensional, modifiable tensor.  This
280/// inherits from const_Tensor, so only the members that const_Tensor
281/// does not carry, or that are different, need be specified.
282template <typename T, typename Block>
283class Tensor : public vsip::impl_View<vsip::Tensor, Block>
284{
285  typedef vsip::impl_View<vsip::Tensor, Block> impl_base_type;
286  typedef typename impl::Lvalue_factory_type<Block>::type impl_factory_type;
287
288  // Implementation compile-time values.
289protected:
290  typedef typename Block::map_type impl_map_type;
291
292  // [view.tensor.subview_types]
293  // Override subview_type and make it writable.
294  typedef impl::Subset_block<Block> impl_subblock_type;
295
296public:
297  typedef typename 
298    vsip::const_Tensor<T, Block>::whole_domain_type whole_domain_type;
299  typedef Tensor<T, impl_subblock_type>      subview_type;
300
301  // Compile-time values.
302  static const dimension_type dim = 3;
303  typedef Block                                       block_type;
304  typedef typename block_type::value_type             value_type;
305  typedef typename impl_factory_type::reference_type  reference_type;
306  typedef typename impl_factory_type::const_reference_type
307		const_reference_type;
308
309  template <dimension_type D0, dimension_type D1, dimension_type D2>
310  struct transpose_view
311  {
312    typedef impl::Permuted_block<block_type, tuple<D0, D1, D2> >
313      impl_transblock_type;
314    typedef       Tensor<T, impl_transblock_type> type;
315    typedef const_Tensor<T, impl_transblock_type> const_type;
316  }; 
317
318  template <dimension_type D>
319  struct submatrix : public impl::Compile_time_assert<(D < 3)>
320  {
321    typedef impl::Sliced_block<block_type, D> block;
322    typedef Matrix<T, block> impl_type;
323    typedef const_Matrix<T, block> impl_const_type;
324
325    typedef impl::Subset_block<block> subblock;
326    typedef Matrix<T, subblock> type;
327    typedef const_Matrix<T, subblock> const_type;
328  };
329
330  template <dimension_type D1, dimension_type D2>
331  struct subvector : public impl::Compile_time_assert<(D1 < D2 && D2 < 3)>
332  {
333    typedef impl::Sliced2_block<block_type, D1, D2> block;
334    typedef Vector<T, block> impl_type;
335    typedef const_Vector<T, block> impl_const_type;
336
337    typedef impl::Subset_block<block> subblock;
338    typedef Vector<T, subblock> type;
339    typedef const_Vector<T, subblock> const_type;
340  };
341
342public:
343
344  // [view.tensor.constructors]
345  Tensor(length_type i, length_type j, length_type k, const T& value,
346	 impl_map_type const& map = impl_map_type())
347    : impl_base_type(i, j, k, value, map, impl::disambiguate)
348  {}
349  Tensor(length_type i, length_type j, length_type k,
350	 impl_map_type const& map = impl_map_type())
351    : impl_base_type(i, j, k, map)
352  {}
353  Tensor(Block& blk) VSIP_NOTHROW : impl_base_type(blk) {}
354  Tensor(Tensor const& v) VSIP_NOTHROW : impl_base_type(v.block())
355  {}
356  template <typename T0, typename Block0>
357  Tensor(const_Tensor<T0, Block0> const& t) VSIP_NOTHROW
358    : impl_base_type (t.size(0), t.size(1), t.size(2), t.block().map())
359  { *this = t;}
360  template <typename T0, typename Block0>
361  Tensor(Tensor<T0, Block0> const& t)
362    : impl_base_type(t.size(0), t.size(1), t.size(2), t.block().map())
363  { *this = t;}
364  ~Tensor() VSIP_NOTHROW {}
365
366  // [view.tensor.transpose]
367  template <dimension_type D0, dimension_type D1, dimension_type D2>
368  typename transpose_view<D0, D1, D2>::const_type
369  transpose() const VSIP_NOTHROW
370  {
371    return impl_base_type::transpose();
372  }
373  template <dimension_type D0, dimension_type D1, dimension_type D2>
374  typename transpose_view<D0, D1, D2>::type
375  transpose() VSIP_NOTHROW
376  {
377    typename transpose_view<D0, D1, D2>::impl_transblock_type  block(
378      this->block());
379    return typename transpose_view<D0, D1, D2>::type(block);
380  }
381
382  // [view.tensor.valaccess]
383  void put(index_type i,
384	   index_type j,
385	   index_type k,
386	   value_type val) const VSIP_NOTHROW
387  {
388    assert(i < this->size(0));
389    assert(j < this->size(1));
390    assert(k < this->size(2));
391    this->block().put(i, j, k, val);
392  }
393
394  reference_type operator()(index_type i,
395                            index_type j,
396                            index_type k) VSIP_NOTHROW
397  { impl_factory_type f(this->block()); return f.impl_ref(i, j, k); }
398
399  Tensor& operator=(Tensor const& t) VSIP_NOTHROW
400  {
401    assert(this->size(0) == t.size(0) &&
402	   this->size(1) == t.size(1) &&
403	   this->size(2) == t.size(2));
404    impl::assign<3>(this->block(), t.block());
405    return *this;
406  }
407
408  Tensor& operator=(const_reference_type val) VSIP_NOTHROW
409  {
410    for (index_type i=0; i<this->size(0); ++i)
411      for (index_type j=0; j<this->size(1); ++j)
412	for (index_type k=0; k<this->size(2); ++k)
413	  this->put(i, j, k, val);
414    return *this;
415  }
416  template <typename T0>
417  Tensor& operator=(T0 const& val) VSIP_NOTHROW
418  {
419    for (index_type i=0; i<this->size(0); ++i)
420      for (index_type j=0; j<this->size(1); ++j)
421	for (index_type k=0; k<this->size(2); ++k)
422	  this->put(i, j, k, val);
423    return *this;
424  }
425  template <typename T0, typename Block0>
426  Tensor& operator=(const_Tensor<T0, Block0> const& t) VSIP_NOTHROW
427  {
428    assert(this->size(0) == t.size(0) &&
429	   this->size(1) == t.size(1) &&
430	   this->size(2) == t.size(2));
431    impl::assign<3>(this->block(), t.block());
432    return *this;
433  }
434  template <typename T0, typename Block0>
435  Tensor& operator=(Tensor<T0, Block0> const& t) VSIP_NOTHROW
436  {
437    assert(this->size(0) == t.size(0) &&
438	   this->size(1) == t.size(1) &&
439	   this->size(2) == t.size(2));
440    impl::assign<3>(this->block(), t.block());
441    return *this;
442  }
443
444  // [view.tensor.subviews]
445  using impl_base_type::operator(); // Pull in all the const versions.
446  subview_type
447  operator()(const Domain<3>& dom) VSIP_THROW((std::bad_alloc))
448  {
449    impl_subblock_type block(dom, this->block());
450    return subview_type(block);
451  }
452
453  typename subvector<1, 2>::type
454  operator()(Domain<1> const& d, index_type j, index_type k)
455    VSIP_THROW((std::bad_alloc))
456  {
457    typename subvector<1, 2>::block block(this->block(), j, k);
458    typename subvector<1, 2>::subblock sblock(d, block);
459    return typename subvector<1, 2>::type(sblock);
460  }
461  typename subvector<0, 2>::type
462  operator()(index_type i, Domain<1> const& d, index_type k)
463    VSIP_THROW((std::bad_alloc))
464  {
465    typename subvector<0, 2>::block block(this->block(), i, k);
466    typename subvector<0, 2>::subblock sblock(d, block);
467    return typename subvector<0, 2>::type(sblock);
468  }
469  typename subvector<0, 1>::type
470  operator()(index_type i, index_type j, Domain<1> const& d)
471    VSIP_THROW((std::bad_alloc))
472  {
473    typename subvector<0, 1>::block block(this->block(), i, j);
474    typename subvector<0, 1>::subblock sblock(d, block);
475    return typename subvector<0, 1>::type(sblock);
476  }
477  typename submatrix<0>::type
478  operator()(index_type i, Domain<1> const& d1, Domain<1> const& d2)
479    VSIP_THROW((std::bad_alloc))
480  {
481    typename submatrix<0>::block block(this->block(), i);
482    typename submatrix<0>::subblock sblock(Domain<2>(d1, d2), block);
483    return typename submatrix<0>::type(sblock);
484  }
485  typename submatrix<1>::type
486  operator()(Domain<1> const& d1, index_type j, Domain<1> const& d2)
487    VSIP_THROW((std::bad_alloc))
488  {
489    typename submatrix<1>::block block(this->block(), j);
490    typename submatrix<1>::subblock sblock(Domain<2>(d1, d2), block);
491    return typename submatrix<1>::type(sblock);
492  }
493  typename submatrix<2>::type
494  operator()(Domain<1> const& d1, Domain<1> const& d2, index_type k)
495    VSIP_THROW((std::bad_alloc))
496  {
497    typename submatrix<2>::block block(this->block(), k);
498    typename submatrix<2>::subblock sblock(Domain<2>(d1, d2), block);
499    return typename submatrix<2>::type(sblock);
500  }
501
502  /// The following operators are an addition to the spec.
503  /// See https://support.codesourcery.com/VSIPLXX/issue26
504  typename subvector<1, 2>::impl_type
505  operator()(whole_domain_type, index_type j, index_type k)
506    VSIP_THROW((std::bad_alloc))
507  {
508    typename subvector<1, 2>::block block(this->block(), j, k);
509    return typename subvector<1, 2>::impl_type(block);
510  }
511  typename subvector<0, 2>::impl_type
512  operator()(index_type i, whole_domain_type, index_type k)
513    VSIP_THROW((std::bad_alloc))
514  {
515    typename subvector<0, 2>::block block(this->block(), i, k);
516    return typename subvector<0, 2>::impl_type(block);
517  }
518  typename subvector<0, 1>::impl_type
519  operator()(index_type i, index_type j, whole_domain_type)
520    VSIP_THROW((std::bad_alloc))
521  {
522    typename subvector<0, 1>::block block(this->block(), i, j);
523    return typename subvector<0, 1>::impl_type(block);
524  }
525  typename submatrix<0>::impl_type
526  operator()(index_type i, whole_domain_type, whole_domain_type)
527    VSIP_THROW((std::bad_alloc))
528  {
529    typename submatrix<0>::block block(this->block(), i);
530    return typename submatrix<0>::impl_type(block);
531  }
532  typename submatrix<1>::impl_type
533  operator()(whole_domain_type, index_type j, whole_domain_type)
534    VSIP_THROW((std::bad_alloc))
535  {
536    typename submatrix<1>::block block(this->block(), j);
537    return typename submatrix<1>::impl_type(block);
538  }
539  typename submatrix<2>::impl_type
540  operator()(whole_domain_type, whole_domain_type, index_type k)
541    VSIP_THROW((std::bad_alloc))
542  {
543    typename submatrix<2>::block block(this->block(), k);
544    return typename submatrix<2>::impl_type(block);
545  }
546
547#ifndef VSIP_IMPL_REF_IMPL
548  template <typename I, typename J, typename K>
549  typename impl::enable_if_c<vsip_csl::pi::is_iterator<I>::value || 
550			     vsip_csl::pi::is_iterator<J>::value || 
551			     vsip_csl::pi::is_iterator<K>::value,
552			     vsip_csl::pi::Call<block_type, I, J, K> >::type
553  operator()(I const &i, J const &j, K const &k)
554  {
555    using namespace vsip_csl::pi;
556    return Call<block_type, I, J, K>(this->block(), i, j, k);
557  }
558#endif
559
560#define VSIP_IMPL_ELEMENTWISE_SCALAR(op)				\
561  for (index_type i = 0; i < this->size(0); ++i)			\
562    for (index_type j = 0; j < this->size(1); ++j)			\
563      for (index_type k = 0; k < this->size(2); ++k)			\
564	this->put(i, j, k, this->get(i, j, k) op val)
565
566#define VSIP_IMPL_ELEMENTWISE_TENSOR(op)				\
567  assert(this->size(0) == m.size(0) &&                                  \
568         this->size(1) == m.size(1) &&                                  \
569         this->size(2) == m.size(2));					\
570  for (index_type i = 0; i < this->size(0); ++i)			\
571    for (index_type j = 0; j < this->size(1); ++j)			\
572      for (index_type k = 0; k < this->size(2); ++k)			\
573	this->put(i, j, k, this->get(i, j, k) op m.get(i, j, k))
574  
575#define VSIP_IMPL_ASSIGN_OP(asop, op)			   	   \
576  template <typename T0>                                           \
577  Tensor& operator asop(T0 const& val) VSIP_NOTHROW                \
578  { VSIP_IMPL_ELEMENTWISE_SCALAR(op); return *this;}               \
579  template <typename T0, typename Block0>                          \
580  Tensor& operator asop(const_Tensor<T0, Block0> m) VSIP_NOTHROW   \
581  { VSIP_IMPL_ELEMENTWISE_TENSOR(op); return *this;}               \
582  template <typename T0, typename Block0>                          \
583  Tensor& operator asop(const Tensor<T0, Block0> m) VSIP_NOTHROW   \
584  { VSIP_IMPL_ELEMENTWISE_TENSOR(op); return *this;}
585
586  // [view.tensor.assign]
587  VSIP_IMPL_ASSIGN_OP(+=, +)
588  VSIP_IMPL_ASSIGN_OP(-=, -)
589  VSIP_IMPL_ASSIGN_OP(*=, *)
590  VSIP_IMPL_ASSIGN_OP(/=, /)
591  VSIP_IMPL_ASSIGN_OP(&=, &)
592  VSIP_IMPL_ASSIGN_OP(|=, |)
593  VSIP_IMPL_ASSIGN_OP(^=, ^)
594};
595
596#undef VSIP_IMPL_ASSIGN_OP
597#undef VSIP_IMPL_ELEMENTWISE_SCALAR
598#undef VSIP_IMPL_ELEMENTWISE_TENSOR
599
600// [view.tensor.convert]
601template <typename T, typename Block>
602struct ViewConversion<Tensor, T, Block>
603{
604  typedef const_Tensor<T, Block> const_view_type;
605  typedef Tensor<T, Block>       view_type;
606};
607
608template <typename T, typename Block>
609struct ViewConversion<const_Tensor, T, Block>
610{
611  typedef const_Tensor<T, Block> const_view_type;
612  typedef Tensor<T, Block>       view_type;
613};
614
615namespace impl
616{
617
618template <typename T,
619	  typename Block>
620struct View_of_dim<3, T, Block>
621{
622  typedef Tensor<T, Block>       type;
623  typedef const_Tensor<T, Block> const_type;
624};
625
626template <typename T, typename Block>
627struct Is_view_type<Tensor<T, Block> >
628{
629  typedef Tensor<T, Block> type; 
630  static bool const value = true;
631};
632
633template <typename T, typename Block>
634struct Is_view_type<const_Tensor<T, Block> >
635{
636  typedef const_Tensor<T, Block> type; 
637  static bool const value = true;
638};
639
640template <typename T, typename Block>
641struct Is_const_view_type<const_Tensor<T, Block> >
642{
643  typedef const_Tensor<T, Block> type; 
644  static bool const value = true;
645};
646
647template <typename T, typename Block>
648T
649get(const_Tensor<T, Block> view, Index<3> const &i)
650{
651  return view.get(i[0], i[1], i[2]);
652}
653
654template <typename T, typename Block>
655void
656put(Tensor<T, Block> view, Index<3> const &i, T value)
657{
658  view.put(i[0], i[1], i[2], value);
659}
660
661/// Return the view extent as a domain.
662template <typename T,
663	  typename Block>
664inline Domain<3>
665view_domain(const_Tensor<T, Block> const& view)
666{
667  return Domain<3>(view.size(0), view.size(1), view.size(2));
668}
669
670/// Get the extent of a tensor view, as a Length.
671template <typename T,
672	  typename Block>
673inline Length<3>
674extent(const_Tensor<T, Block> const &v)
675{
676  return Length<3>(v.size(0), v.size(1), v.size(2));
677}
678
679} // namespace vsip::impl
680} // namespace vsip

682#endif // VSIP_TENSOR_HPP
